courseA_maze_seq2.courseA_maze_seq2_a: E 1 le poloka o loo misi i lau polokalame. E mafai ona e iloa poo fea?
courseA_maze_seq2.courseA_maze_seq2_b: Taumafai e faaalu muamua le faailo e iloa ai poo fea e iu iai le manu. O fea e te manao e alu ai mai iina?

courseA_maze_seq3.courseA_maze_seq3_a: O se 1 o poloka o loo faaalu sese le manu i se ala sese. E mafai ona e vaai poo fea le poloka sese ma sui i le poloka sao?
courseA_maze_seq3.courseA_maze_seq3_b: Taumafai e faaaoga le ki o le sitepu e sue ai poo fea tonu o loo faaletonu ai le polokalame. O se sitepu muamua? O le lona lua?
courseA_maze_seq3.courseA_maze_seq3_c: O lenei <xml><block type="maze_moveNorth"/></xml> poloka e le o sao le ala o loo faaalu ai le manu. E mafai ona e suia i se isi poloka?

courseA_maze_seq4.courseA_maze_seq4_a: Afai o iai se faaletonu, taumafai e sue le ala sao ma toe aveese le poloka pe a le ofi.
courseA_maze_seq4.courseA_maze_seq4_b: Taumafai e faaalu le faailo i le tulaga o loo iai. O iai se faaletonu? O fea le poloka e mafai ona aveese? E faapefea ona toe faalelei?

courseA_maze_seq9.courseA_maze_seq9_a: O faigata? Taumafai e faaaoga lou lima e vaai ai le ala o le manu
courseA_maze_seq9.courseA_maze_seq9_b: Afai e te le o mautinoa le mea e fai, taumfai e oomi le "Start over" ma toe faaalu le faailo e iloa ai poo le a le faaletonu.
courseA_maze_seq9.courseA_maze_seq9_c: E manaomia lou alu i ni ala se 3 ina ia maua le tali mo lenei paso.

courseC_video_angles.courseD_scrat_programming6_b: Manatua e liliu muamua ae lei faaalu, e talu ai e sese le itu o loo faasaga iai Scrat.

courseD_artist_ramp11.courseD_artist_ramp11a: A fia tusi o se itu, faaaoga le poloka o le 'move forward by 100 pixels', ma sui le 100 i le 200.

courseD_maze_ramp7.courseD_maze_ramp7_a: Toe faaaoga poloka e faaalu ai poloka taitasi poo avatu ma toe avatu ni faailo se tele

courseD_scrat_ramp1.courseC_maze_programming1_a: Afai e le oo atu Scrat i le fatulaau, e tatau ona gau faatasi uma poloka e tolu, ona oomi lea o le "Run".

courseD_scrat_ramp2.courseC_maze_programming2_b: Tautuana ia 'move forward' uma poloka e tolu o loo pipii i le poloka 'when run'.

courseD_scrat_ramp3.courseC_maze_programming3_b: Manatua o le liliu i le taumatau ma le agavale o le vaaiga mai ia Scrat

courseD_scrat_ramp5.courseC_maze_programming5_b: O le a le mamao e manaomia ona e alu ina ia e oo i le tulimanu?
courseD_scrat_ramp5.courseC_maze_programming5_c: E manaomia lou afe i le agavale i le tulimanu ina ia e oo i le fatulaau

courseD_scrat_ramp6.courseC_maze_programming6a_a: Faaaoga le lio 'repeat' ina ia faaminoi ma faaalu Scrat.

courseD_scrat_ramp7.courseD_scrat_programming6_b: Manatua e liliu muamua ae lei faaalu, e talu ai e sese le itu o loo faasaga iai Scrat.

courseD_scrat_ramp8.courseD_maze_ramp7_a: Toe faaaoga poloka e faaalu ai poloka taitasi poo avatu ma toe avatu ni faailo se tele

courseD_video_nestedLoopsArtist.courseD_artist_ramp12_a: E faapefea ona tutusa lenei ma le tafafa? E faapefea ona eseese?
courseD_video_nestedLoopsArtist.courseD_artist_ramp12_c: Ina ia tusi itu taitasi, e manaomia ona faaalu i luma le 100 pixels, ona liliu lea i le 120 tikeri. E fia itu e te manaomia?
courseD_video_nestedLoopsArtist.courseE_artist_ramp8_a: A fia tusi o se itu, faaaoga le poloka o le 'move forward by 100 pixels', ma sui le 100 i le 200.
courseD_video_nestedLoopsArtist.courseE_artist_ramp8_b: A fia tusi o itu e 4, tuu le poloka o le 'move forward by 100 pixels', i totonu o le lio toe taamilo ma taumafai e faatulaga le lio ina ia mafai ona tusi faafa le ata
courseD_video_nestedLoopsArtist.courseE_artist_ramp8_c: O lou lio e tatau ona iai poloka se lua i totonu o le lio: 'move foward' ma le 'turn right by 90 degrees'.

courseE_artist_ramp8.courseE_artist_ramp8_a: A fia tusi o se itu, faaaoga le poloka o le 'move forward by 100 pixels', ma sui le 100 i le 200.
courseE_artist_ramp8.courseE_artist_ramp8_b: A fia tusi o itu e 4, tuu le poloka o le 'move forward by 100 pixels', i totonu o le lio toe taamilo ma taumafai e faatulaga le lio ina ia mafai ona tusi faafa le ata
courseE_artist_ramp8.courseE_artist_ramp8_c: O lou lio e tatau ona iai poloka se lua i totonu o le lio: 'move foward' ma le 'turn right by 90 degrees'.

courseE_artist_ramp8_2.courseE_artist_ramp8_a: A fia tusi o se itu, faaaoga le poloka o le 'move forward by 100 pixels', ma sui le 100 i le 200.
courseE_artist_ramp8_2.courseE_artist_ramp8_b: A fia tusi o itu e 4, tuu le poloka o le 'move forward by 100 pixels', i totonu o le lio toe taamilo ma taumafai e faatulaga le lio ina ia mafai ona tusi faafa le ata
courseE_artist_ramp8_2.courseE_artist_ramp8_c: O lou lio e tatau ona iai poloka se lua i totonu o le lio: 'move foward' ma le 'turn right by 90 degrees'.

courseE_artist_ramp9.courseD_artist_ramp12_a: E faapefea ona tutusa lenei ma le tafafa? E faapefea ona eseese?
courseE_artist_ramp9.courseD_artist_ramp12_c: Ina ia tusi itu taitasi, e manaomia ona faaalu i luma le 100 pixels, ona liliu lea i le 120 tikeri. E fia itu e te manaomia?

courseF_artist_variables3.courseF_artist_variables3_b: O le poloka numera e 50 le tau e tatau ona iai i se nofoaga se tasi: pe a uma ona faatulaga le poloka 'set variable lenght'.

courseF_artist_variables4.courseF_artist_variables4_a: O lau faailo e le tele se eseesega mai le paso mulimuli, sei vagana e manaomia ona ki le artist e oso i lalo, ma liliu ina ia toe oso i luma.

courseF_playlab_variables7c.courseF_playlab_variables7c_a: Tuu le poloka 'ask' fou i luma o lau faaupuga 'if/else' ina ia mafai ona faaaoga i isi laasaga.

courseF_playlab_variables8c.courseF_playlab_variables8c_a: O le poloka 'join' e alu i toto o le poloka 'actor say', ma e tuu atu ia te oe le faaaogaina o fuainumera i fuaiupu lapopoa
